Accessibility

Instantiation

White square in the upper left quadrant on black background

Create a p5 instance, which keeps all variables out of the global scope of your page.

let sketch = function(p) {
  let x = 100;
  let y = 100;

  p.setup = function() {
    p.createCanvas(700, 410);
  };

  p.draw = function() {
    p.background(0);
    p.fill(255);
    p.rect(x, y, 50, 50);
  };
};

let myp5 = new p5(sketch);

// Compare to "global mode"
// let x = 100;
// let y = 100;
